Text: Thanks. FYI for anyone who wants to know. This series takes place in Next Men continuity.

I don't know if that's a selling point or a drawback, so I'll add that this is a 1st issue that stands on its own. You don't have to know anything about any other comic. If you can relate to a young man starting his first "real" job -- and it just happens to be as an interplanetary astronaut -- I think you'll enjoy this! I think it is outstanding.
